That ending was ... pretty bittersweet.  I mean, like the ending was very rushed, or something like that.  It's like "I saw mom cry so I won't do this anymore."  and suddenly her libido was gone.  I do not know, I am not convinced.  Although the art is amazing.  And the story is nothing to write home about, although the ending leaves a bad taste in your mouth, despite the fact that it wants to finish things off.  But to my taste, it was a machete-cut ending. --- Something else would have been better.  For example.  that the mother found out that the son was the one doing it, or that she knew it all the time, and that they had reached an agreement, and that they would never do that again. --- CONCLUSION: Art: 9.5/10 Story: 6/10 Ending: 2/10
